title: Tile, late 18th–early 19th century
dimensions: H x W x D (overall): 13 x 13 cm (5 1/8 x 5 1/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Man in blue coat, walking toward left, holding short stick with yellow tip in his right hand.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Earthenware, glazed, high fire decoration. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1920-15-157.
